entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-08-09
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Consider deprecating keyless entity types in favor of complex types #31439
  • Error Updating a Json Column in an Entity not Tracked #31438
  • Please give me example how replace IModificationCommand to my implementation in MyDbContext #31434
  • Owned Json entity with init-only property setter results in ArgumentException in Preview 7 #31433

Closed

  • Add SQLitePCLRaw assets for .NET 8 WASM #29000
    8.0.0-rc1
  • Problem assigning a role to a user (Oracle 11 database) #31432
  • EntityFrameworkCore 7 SetProperty(avar,avalue) Unable to cast object of type 'System.Linq.Expressions.TypedParameterExpression' to type 'System.Linq.Expressions.LambdaExpression'. #31349
    8.0.0
  • Allow ExecuteUpdate to update properties of multiple queries as long as the map to a single table #31406
    8.0.0
  • `dotnet counters` "Query Cache Hit Rate" reset to `-1` every second? #31395
  • underlying sql log #31375
  • Entity Framework Core : seed data error using OwnsOne #31373
  • Cascade delete child entities, where parent has no navigation property to children #31340

PullRequests

Created

  • Migrations: Synthesize HasColumnName in snapshot when DefaultColumnName uses CLR type #31437

Merged

  • Multiple entity support for ExecuteUpdate #31408
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'main' #31430
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge, type-merge forward :fast_forward:

Updated

  • SQLite: Translate more Math members #31356
  • Metadata for primitive collection mapping #31351
  • Fix to #31100 - Switch to storing enums as ints in JSON instead of strings #31317
